name: Submerged (itch) (WaffleWorks)
description:
Navigate your submarine through dangerous waters in this 8 bit style survival game!

Controls:
W - Up
A - Left
S - Down
D - Right
Space - Shoot

Credits:
Programmer - Isaac White

Menu Music - Isaac White

Suspenseful Music - Ethan Coble

Art - Ethan Coble, Jacob West, Luca Stockwil, Isaac White, Maksim Smith, Alex Mehmedovic

Game Design - Ethan Coble, Jacob West, Luca Stockwil, Isaac White, Maksim Smith, Alex Mehmedovic
